mapper.select: select * from enterprise_info order by create_time desc, id desc limit #{start}, #{num}
select * from enterprise_info where type LIKE concat('%',#{type},'%') order by create_time desc, id desc limit #{start}, #{num}

select e.id, e.card_id as cardId, e.message, DATE_FORMAT(e.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as lastString, c.headimgurl, c.realname, c.job, c.company from enterprise_comment e left join card_info c on e.card_id = c.id where e.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
select id, name, DATE_FORMAT(e.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as lastString from enterprise_consulting e where e.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
select count(*) from enterprise_consulting e where e.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
select count(*) from enterprise_comment e where e.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
select title from enterprise_info where id = #{enterpriseId}
select id,name,phone,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime,title,read_status from enterprise_consulting order by read_status,create_time desc
mapper.update: update enterprise_consulting set read_status = 1 where id = #{id}
